name: 萌萌２次大戰（略）３ Moe Moe World War II-3
detailed_description:
What is Moe Moe World War II - 3? Moe Moe World War II - 3 is the part 3 of Moe Moe World War series. The main characters are lovely girls who use World War II weapons. The game types of Moe Moe World War II - 3 are blended simulation and adventure.

The story is centered on the anthropomorphic weapon girl known as the "Girl of Steel" and includes three story lines: "Japan Route", "Joint Route", and "Deutsche Route". The player controls the character as the commander, and orders the fatal blow skills and other commands to fight and lead the victory.

Moe Moe World War II – 3, they are:
To enjoy the "ADV (Adventure Game) part" of the girls' conversation.
Gorgeous strategies build up “SLG simulation parts”.
Aggressively get in touch with the girls that combine three parts of the "repair part".


«Game Features»

Key word【super evolution】
Super evolution of characters:
With the growth of the heart, the characters’ appearances will also greatly super-evolution
Super-evolved steel girl!
Super gorgeous arms will make you look good!

Super evolution of the story:
Based on historical facts and enjoyable story, unexpected fun turns into a girl of steel girl!
Super evolutionary story!
It’s cute, burning, and it’s making people laugh and cry! ?

Super evolution of the game system:
The strategic SLG blends with a slightly horny repair part miraculously. Super-evolved repair parts! What is the condition for achieving undressing?

So What is Moe Moe World War II - 3?
It is a game that weapons as the beautiful young girls + simulation game.

supported_languages:
Japanese*, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10/8.1/8/7/vista
  • Processor: above doul core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: above １９２０X１０８０ FULL HD
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Sound Card: directx sound compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10/8.1/8/7/vista
  • Processor: above doul core i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: above １９２０X１０８０ FULL HD
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Sound Card: directx sound compatible

publishers: 英特衛多媒體股份有限公司

movies.name: 萌え萌え２次大戦（略）３　オープニングムービーを公開！
